game.name: Shenaniguns
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Get stupid & get stupid weapons. Kill your friends to WIN BIG!!! Shenaniguns is a silly, frantic top-down multiplayer shooter, with tons of unique guns and items in a randomiser. No time to think!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get stupid & get stupid weapons. Kill your friends to WIN BIG!!! Shenaniguns is a silly, frantic top-down multiplayer shooter, with tons of unique guns and items in a randomiser. No time to think!
